headline: Is T-Mobile US Still Attractive After Recent 5G Expansion and Share Price Pullback in 2025
summary: Wondering if T-Mobile US is still a smart buy at today’s price, or if the big run in telecom is already behind it? Let us unpack whether the current share price lines up with the company’s underlying value. T-Mobile’s stock has cooled recently, with the shares down about 0.2% over the last week, 4.0% over the last month and roughly 9.3% year to date. It is still up 48.2% over three years and 54.6% over five years. That mix of short term weakness and strong long term gains is exactly where...
